title: Ticket #7212: Build a multifile plugin example that implements Gluster transfer
description:
We want to provide an example of a file transfer plugin that implements our "multifile" protocol. This plugin will need to do the following:

  1. Read in a list of classads from an input file. Each classad describes a file to be transferred.
  2. Transfer all the files
  3. Output a list of classads to a file. Each classad represents statistics for one of the files that was transferred.

In order to make this a live example (instead of just a code template) we'll make this transfer files to and from the gluster file system. Users will specify input files as gluster://path/to/file and the plugin will translate this to a path in the gluster filesystem. This way files will get sent directly from gluster to the execute node, instead of getting transferred via the submit node.
